title: About the league of legends collector's pack
body: I have league of legends collectors pack the first release its sealed , on the first days before the game gets free i lost the disk and finally i found it after all these years, do you think its worth to open it so i can use the code i just want to be sure if its going to work or not , if not i will keep it sealed as a collection please let me know so i can open it or not i want the skins so badly i was just unlucky these days so i need help...

replies.body:
A long while back now they invalidated all outstanding codes to stop people selling things like Black Alistar for thousands of dollars. Any codes that are in the box will be invalid. That said though, I'd recommend submitting a ticket to Player Support about it. 

If you can prove you have the physical code, and they still have the means to prove it was never used, they might be able to simply credit you the content. I'd say it's worth looking into, but defs submit the ticket before you think about opening it.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

FYI The login for the support page and the website (boards) are seperate. 
https://i.imgur.com/IrSBuzi.png?noredirect

There are currently issues with the login transition preventing players from easily logging into support. There are two current workarounds:

1. Open the support page in an incognito/private window and follow the process as normal, pressing the login button when prompted.

2. Log out of the website **from the support page**, and then follow the process as normal, pressing login when prompted.

If your support page has the blank "OC" login in the top right, you're good to go. If it only has your summoner icon with "OCEANIA" it means the support page is seeing you as logged in on the website and not in support. You need to follow one of the steps above.
Thank you very much i will check it out
